books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice. Read by the author. 8 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: UNTAMED

books.author: Isabel Wilkerson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today. Read by Robin Miles. 14 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CASTE

books.author: Jerry Seinfeld
books.description: The comedian shares material he collected in an accordion folder over the last 45 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 19 minutes unabridged.
books.title: IS THIS ANYTHING?

books.author: Bob Woodward
books.description: Based on 17 on-the-record interviews with President Trump and other reporting, the Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist details the president’s perspective on multiple crises. Read by Robert Petkoff. 13 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: RAGE

books.author: Trevor Noah
books.description: A memoir about growing up in South Africa by the host of “The Daily Show.” Read by the author. 8 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BORN A CRIME

books.author: Mariah Carey with Michaela Angela Davis
books.contributor: by Mariah Carey with Michaela Angela Davis
books.description: The career highlights, personal struggles and public life events of the singer and songwriter. Read by Mariah Carey. 11 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE MEANING OF MARIAH CAREY

books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent. Read by the author. 19 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BECOMING

books.author: Candace Owens
books.description: The conservative commentator makes her case that Black Americans should part ways with the Democratic Party. Read by the author. 6 hours, 51 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BLACKOUT

books.author: Brian C Muraresku
books.description: The potential role psychedelics may have played in the origins of Western civilization. Read by the author. 15 hours, 11 minutes unabridged.

books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Famous examples of miscommunication serve as the backdrop to explain potential conflicts. Read by the author. 8 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: TALKING TO STRANGERS

books.author: James Nestor
books.description: A re-examination of a basic biological function. Read by the author. 7 hours, 18 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BREATH

books.description: An account of President Trump’s business empire, political campaign and presidential administration by his former personal attorney. Read by Robert Petkoff. 11 hours, 50 minutes unabridged.

books.description: How trauma affects the body and mind, and innovative treatments for recovery. Read by Sean Pratt. 16 hours, 17 minutes unabridged.
